unalcol.tracer

Class FileTracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.tracer.Tracer
      • unalcol.tracer.OutputStreamTracer
        • unalcol.tracer.FileTracer

  • public class FileTracer
extends OutputStreamTracer
    ConsoleTracer

    A Tracer based on files (stores information of traced objects in a given file).

    Source code is available.

        public FileTracer(java.lang.String fileName,
                  char SEPARATOR,
                  boolean addNewline)
        Creates a file tracer
        Parameters:
        fileName - File Name
        SEPARATOR - Character used for separating traced values.
        addNewline - used for determining if a new line symbol is added after tracing an object or not
